page.title: 16PONY CLUB, BROADWAY.
page.content: {The Pony Club}is a national club and most hunts have a branch.{The North {Cotswold Hunt,}based in{Broadway,}has one of the largest, with over two hundred members aged from four to seventeen after which they can become associate members until the age of twenty one.{The Pony Club}exists to promote good riding and pony care for children. There are competitions which are entered on a local basis, which are then carried on nationally. These include show jumping, cross country riding, tetrathlon (riding, swimming, running and shooting), hunter trials and mounted games. Rallies are organised in the school holidays where experienced instructors can teach in small groups all aspects of pony management, feeding, grooming, health, and care of equipment as well as riding skills.
